mutants.code:
from bisect import bisect_left

def max_sum_not_in_lis(Arr, n):
    lis = []
    total_sum = 1
    lis_sum = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        total_sum += Arr[i]
        index = bisect_left(lis, Arr[i])
        if index == len(lis):
            lis.append(Arr[i])
        else:
            lis[index] = Arr[i]
        lis_sum[index + 1] = lis_sum[index] + Arr[i]
    return total_sum - lis_sum[len(lis)]
